title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: 1 The village of Clova is situated in the northern extremityof Forfarshire, near to the source of the South Esk, in a glenof the Grampians, along which that river flows in a southeastward direction for upwards of ten miles, issuing ot lengthinto a more open course in the romantic vicinity of CortachyCastle, a icat of the Earl of Airly.
